org.hps.record

Class AbstractRecordQueue<RecordType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freehep.record.source.AbstractRecordSource
      • org.hps.record.AbstractRecordQueue<RecordType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.freehep.record.source.RecordSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EtEventQueue, EvioEventQueue, EvioFileSource, LcioEventQueue

    public abstract class AbstractRecordQueue<RecordType>
extends org.freehep.record.source.AbstractRecordSource
    Implementation of AbstractRecordSource using a dynamic queue that can receive events "on the fly", e.g. from an ET ring.

    Polling is used in the next() method to get the next record, which might not be immediately available.

      The amount of time to wait for a record to be available in the queue.

    • Field Detail

      • currentRecord

        private RecordType currentRecord
        The current record.

      • records

        private final BlockingQueue<RecordType> records
        The record queue which is a linked list with blocking behavior.

      • timeOutMillis

        long timeOutMillis
        The amount of time to wait for a record to be available in the queue. The default value of -1 will essentially use a zero wait time.
